name: Harmony III
description: When light falls to earth, and illuminates all that is seen on earth and then colors are born into existence, without light color feels empty, and see how color is no longer just one kind but even thousands of harmonious colors occur as a result. Everything feels related when we also have to be the light in our lives because without light, the colors of our lives no longer exist. Then be a light in your own life and see how beautifully you shine.
